hero.title: Hemp-based solutions for every sustainability mandate
hero.subtitle: We design and operate licensed hemp value chains matched with the performance, compliance, and ESG needs of giga-projects, regulators, and industrial leaders.

highlights.body: Choose a pathway to uncover business value, operational readiness, and the technical specs that move projects from pilot to scale.

pathways.title: Sectors we empower
pathways.subtitle: High-level impact first. Deep-dive specs when you're ready to commit.

sectors.title: Cultivation
sectors.summary: Design hemp rotations that sequester carbon, rehabilitate soil, and unlock new income streams for growers.

sectors.title: Construction
sectors.summary: Transforming desert environments into carbon sinks. Through precision agriculture and regenerative crop rotation, we cultivate climate resilient hemp that restore soil health and supplies raw materials for Saudi Arabia's green transition.

sectors.title: Textile
sectors.summary: Traceable hemp fibres for hospitality, healthcare, and premium textiles with finishing and testing support.

sectors.title: Energy & biofuels
sectors.summary: Convert hemp biomass into clean fuels and CHP-ready pellets with emissions accounting and feedstock specs.

sectors.title: Biocomposites
sectors.summary: Engineer hemp-based composites for automotive, aerospace, and packaging programs with tested mechanical properties. We supply fibre specs, resin pairings, and processing guidance to reduce risk during line trials.

sectors.title: Waste & remediation
sectors.summary: Quantify, verify, and monetise carbon sequestration from hemp projects with third-party validation and registry listings.

sectors.title: Agriculture
sectors.summary: Supply inputs like hemp mats, mulches, and seeds that elevate productivity across controlled environments and open fields. We tailor genetics, substrates, and irrigation guidance to desert conditions and high-value crops.

sectors.title: Animal care
sectors.summary: Clean, absorbent hemp inputs for livestock comfort, feed enrichment, and specialty animal health with full traceability. Programs include bedding specs, feed formulations, and waste-to-compost protocols.

sectors.title: Cosmetics & personal care
sectors.summary: Develop CBD and non-CBD hemp actives for skincare, haircare, and spa applications with transparent sourcing. We provide COAs, stability data, and formulation guidance to shorten R&D cycles.

sectors.title: Food & beverage
sectors.summary: Launch nutrient-dense hemp foods and beverages with clean supply assurance and sensory support. We help brands with formulation, shelf-life testing, and regulatory pathways to move from pilot to retail quickly.

sectors.title: Pharmaceuticals & wellness
sectors.summary: Produce GMP-ready CBD, minor cannabinoids, and pharmaceutical flower for therapeutic programs with validated quality systems. We handle genetics, cultivation SOPs, and documentation to satisfy regulators and clinical partners.

sectors.title: Services
sectors.summary: Advisory, licensing, and supply-chain services that de-risk hemp adoption across any sector. We align strategy, engineering, and operations so teams can launch projects with confidence.

workWithUs.label: Partner with our team
workWithUs.body: Tell us about your project and we'll design a hemp solution mapped to your KPIs.

hero.title: Cultivation
hero.body: Transforming desert environments into carbon sinks. Through precision agriculture and regenerative crop rotation, we cultivate climate resilient hemp that restore soil health and supplies raw materials for Saudi Arabia's green transition.

paragraphs: Green Desert is redefining agricultural production in arid regions. Industrial hemp cultivation goes beyond traditional farming it is a regenerative industrial model designed for challenging climates.With deep root systems and low water requirements, hemp supports soil rehabilitation and sustainable biomass production in arid regions.
Our approach transforms this resilient crop into a high-value carbon sink that restores soil health while supplying sustainable raw materials for a future-ready economy.

Our approach combines science-based agronomy with regional priorities, ensuring agricultural productivity while protecting natural resources. We conduct a rigorous assessment of soil quality and land to establish a baseline for success, followed by crop selection suited for arid climates using salt-tolerant and heat-resilient genetics.

By integrating efficient water and nutrient management through precision irrigation, we minimize resource consumption. Throughout the cultivation cycle, we maintain continuous performance monitoring and optimization to ensure a reliable, high-yield sovereign feedstock supply.

highlights.title: Capabilities
highlights.subtitle: Advancing the Kingdom’s food and material security through high-yield, water-efficient regenerative agronomy.

items.title: Innovative Solutions
items.description: Climate-adapted hemp cultivars and precision agriculture systems designed to perform in arid and desert-edge environments.

items.title: Target Approach
items.description: Custom irrigation, soil management, and agronomy tailored to Middle Eastern soil profiles and water constraints.

items.title: Fast Implementation
items.description: Rapid growth cycles enable multiple harvests per year, accelerating biomass production and project timelines.

items.title: Relible & Secure
items.description: Licensed cultivation operations with traceability and compliance frameworks.

items.title: Scalable Growth
items.description: Cultivation systems capable of expanding from local projects to national and regional level.

items.title: Industry Leading
items.description: Serving as the Kingdom's first licensed pioneer in industrial hemp research, setting the regional standard for arid-land biotechnology.

features.title: Hands-on
features.subTitle: Providing full agronomic management, from soil capability assessment to optimized harvesting, ensuring a reliable sovereign feedstock supply.

items.title: Advanced Technology
items.description: Using of climate-smart R&D and precision systems to ensure resilient hemp crops thrive in harsh, arid environments.

items.title: Sustainable Solutions
items.description: Delivering carbon-sequestering cultivation models that restore soil health while producing the high-value raw materials needed for a green economy.

items.title: Expert Support
items.description: Global agronomy and cultivation expertise embedded within our licensed operations, combining international best practices with local execution to ensure varietal performance, system integrity, and full regulatory compliance.

hero.title: Construction
hero.body: Creating low-carbon building envelopes to support the Kingdom’s urban growth. Our hempcrete systems are developed using verified mix designs and strict QA/QC protocols to meet the rigorous structural and thermal performance requirements of large-scale Saudi developments.

paragraphs: Hemp-based construction materials offer a low-carbon alternative to conventional building systems, combining high-performance insulation and durability. Engineered for arid and GCC climates, these materials reduce reliance on carbon-intensive inputs while supporting circular, climate-resilient construction at scale, By replacing traditional, energy heavy materials.

Our bio-composite solutions allow builders to significantly decrease the embodied carbon of their projects. This strategy not only meets Saudi Arabia's environmental thermal requirements but also provides a measurable pathway toward achieving national net-zero targets.
Bio-Mass Processing: Converting raw hemp stalks into high-quality hurd and fiber.
Precision Formulation: Utilizing our verified mix designs to create climate- adaptive binders.
Industrial Manufacturing: Scaling the production of blocks, panels, and spray-applied insulation.
Site Integration: Delivering ready-to-use building envelopes that meet Saudi building codes.

highlights.title: Capabilities
highlights.subtitle: Decarbonizing the built environment with carbon-sequestering bio-materials and high-performance thermal insulation.

items.title: Thermal Resilience
items.description: High performance insulation that reduces cooling energy demand, engineered specifically for the extreme heat of the GCC.

items.title: Carbon Sequestration
items.description: A net-negative building material that actively captures CO2 , helping developers achieve their Net-Zero goals.

items.title: Fire & Safety
items.description: Naturally fire-resistant bio-composites that meet rigorous international safety standards for large-scale developments.

items.title: Breathable
items.description: Superior moisture regulation that prevents mold and improves indoor air quality in humid or coastal desert regions.

items.title: Acoustic Comfort
items.description: High-density Hempcrete provides exceptional sound dampening, ideal for high-end residential and urban commercial projects.

items.title: Circular Economy
items.description: A fully renewable resource that supports the Kingdom’s shift toward sustainable, waste-free construction ecosystems.

features.title: Hands-on
features.subTitle: Assisting developers and engineers in integrating carbon-negative bio-materials into modern infrastructure for superior thermal and structural performance.

items.title: Climate-Adaptive Engineering
items.description: Material systems specifically designed to withstand the GCC’s extreme heat, reducing Air Conditioning& heating dependency and enhancing the longevity of the building.

items.title: Sustainable Solutions
items.description: By constructing building systems that absorb more carbon than they release, builders can reduce the embodied carbon of large-scale projects.

items.title: Quality Assurance
items.description: Fully controlled QA/QC and structural testing protocols, ensuring every hemp-based component meets the safety and building codes of the Kingdom.

hero.title: Textiles
hero.body: Developing high-tenacity, climate-adaptive fibers for the Kingdom’s industrial and fashion sectors. Delivering sustainable textile systems that meet the rigorous performance and comfort standards of the GCC.

paragraphs: Hemp fiber represents the future of sustainable textiles, combining exceptional durability with environmental responsibility. It offers performance that matches or exceeds traditional materials while requiring minimal water and no pesticides.
Our goal is to provide a regenerative alternative to one of the world's most polluting sectors, delivering premium quality while minimizing environmental impact.
Specialized Decortication– Mechanically separating the hemp stalk into high-quality fiber and Hurd using precision industrial equipment.
Advanced Degumming– Utilizing eco-friendly processes to remove lignin and pectins, ensuring the fiber is soft enough for premium textiles.
Refinement & Spinning– Preparing the fiber for blending with organic cotton or silk to meet the standards of global luxury markets.

highlights.subtitle: Engineering superior, locally-sourced natural fibers to drive a sustainable textile value chain.

items.title: Biodegradability
items.description: The material is fully biodegradable and can be safely returned to the earth at the end of its lengthy life

items.title: UV Protection
items.description: Naturally blocks a high percentage of harmful UVA/UVB rays, with testing showing 50% higher efficacy than polyester.

items.title: Hypoallergenic
items.description: Naturally gentle and non-irritating,making it an ideal choice for sensitive skin.

items.title: Highly Absorbent
items.description: The porosity of the fiber allows it to absorb moisture efficiently, making it perfect for towels and activewear.

items.title: Antimicrobial
items.description: Prevents the formation of mold and bacteria that cause odors.

items.title: Durability
items.description: 3x to 5x stronger than cotton, with less stretching or degradation.

items.title: Breathable
items.description: The permeable fiber enables excellent air circulation, removing moisture and insulating the body—cool in summer, warm in winter.

features.subTitle: Integrating advanced fiber processing with localized manufacturing to deliver high-tenacity materials that meet global industrial standards

items.title: Advanced Technology
items.description: Using specific decortication processes, raw hemp is refined into high-tenacity, long-lasting fibers suitable for industrial spinning.

items.title: Sustainable Solutions
items.description: Providing low-impact, biodegradable alternatives to synthetics, enabling brands to lower their emissions while supporting the Saudi Green Initiative.

items.title: Expert Support
items.description: Managing technical validation, customized mixing, and finishing support to guarantee that each textile batch satisfies the highest worldwide durability and safety standards.

hero.title: Energy & biofuels
hero.body: Converting industrial biomass into clean fuels, green hydrogen feedstock, and Cogeneration ready pellets. We engineer feedstock specifications and emissions accounting to deliver verified, carbon-negative heat and power solutions.

paragraphs: Energy diversification and decarbonization one of the Saudi Vision 2030. Our Energy & Biofuel solutions focus on converting sustainable biomass into renewable energy inputs that support national energy transition goals. By leveraging bio-based resources.
we contribute to reduced emissions, enhanced energy security, and the development of circular, low-carbon industries.
Biomass Harvesting: Gathering high-cellulose hemp stalks from our licensed cultivation areas.
Technical Processing: Mechanical refining and pelletization to meet specific CHP and industrial boiler requirements.
Impact Validation: Providing the carbon sequestration data and emissions certificates required for national energy compliance.

highlights.subtitle: Powering a circular future with high-densitybiomass and advanced biofuels designed for low-carbon intensity.

items.title: Carbon Substitution
items.description: Providing a direct, renewable alternative to high-carbon fossil fuels for industrial heat and power generation.

items.title: Cogeneration Efficiency
items.description: Optimized for Combined Heat and Power (CHP) systems to maximize energy recovery and reduce operational losses.

items.title: Hydrogen Feedstock
items.description: Clean, verified biomass engineered for compatibility with emerging green hydrogen and bio-syngas pathways.

items.title: Lifecycle Traceability
items.description: Full carbon accounting, MRV frameworks, and data verification to support national ESG, decarbonization, and reporting requirements.

items.title: High Calorific Density
items.description: Engineered pellets and briquettes delivering consistent combustion and superior energy-per-kilogram performance.

items.title: Sustainable Logistics
items.description: Reliable, year-round feedstock supply chains designed for large-scale industrial energy consumers.

features.subTitle: Optimizing the energy value chain through high-precision biomass processing and the development of stabilized, low-carbon biofuel feedstocks.

items.title: Advanced Technology
items.description: Using advanced mechanical refining and pelletization processes, raw biomass is transformed into high-performance, standardized energy inputs.

items.title: Sustainable Solutions
items.description: Delivering verified carbon-negative pathways that allow heavy industry to reduce emissions while supporting the Saudi Green Initiative.

items.title: Expert Support
items.description: Managing feedstock specifications, logistical coordination, and emissions validation to ensure seamless integration into existing energy infrastructure.

hero.title: Biocomposites
hero.body: Engineering hemp-based composites for automotive and packaging programs with tested mechanical properties. We supply fiber specifications, resin pairings, and technical guidance to reduce risk and lower the carbon footprint of industrial components.

paragraphs: Hemp-reinforced biocomposites offer a high-performance, low-impact alternative to conventional composite materials. By combining hemp fiber’s exceptional strength-to-weight ratio with bio-based resins, these materials deliver lighter, stronger, and more sustainable components for advanced manufacturing applications.

Aligned with Saudi Vision 2030, our biocomposite solutions support industrial diversification and material innovation, providing a verified pathway for the transition toward resource-efficient, low-carbon manufacturing.
Fiber modification: the process of mechanically and chemically treating high-purity hemp fibers to ensure good resin bonding.
Advanced molding: the process of creating high-performance industrial components using compression molding or 3D printing methods.
Performance validation: conducting extensive stress, temperature, and durability tests to ensure compliance with production standards.

highlights.subtitle: Replacing traditional plastics with high-specific- strength bio-composites engineered for automotive and industrial excellence.

items.title: Strength
items.description: Superior mechanical performance that reduces component weight without sacrificing structural integrity.

items.title: Vibration Damping
items.description: Natural acoustic and vibration absorption properties, ideal for automotive and industrial housings.

items.title: Low Embodied Carbon
items.description: Significant reduction in manufacturing emissions compared to traditional glass fiber or petroleum-based resins.

items.title: Thermal Stability
items.description: Low thermal expansion rates ensuring dimensional stability in the extreme temperature shifts of the GCC.

items.title: National Supply Chain
items.description: Locally sourced raw materials that strengthen Saudi Arabia’s industrial autonomy and material security.

features.subTitle: Engineering custom bio-composite resin and fiber blends to meet the rigorous mechanical and weight-reduction requirements of modern manufacturing.

items.title: Advanced Technology
items.description: Optimizing fiber aspect ratios and surface treatments to maximize interfacial bonding strength for high-load industrial applications.

items.title: Sustainable Solutions
items.description: Replacing petroleum-based fillers with high-tenacity hemp biomass to significantly lower the carbon footprint of mass-produced components.

items.title: Expert Support
items.description: Providing on-site processing guidance and custom fiber specifications to ensure seamless transitions during industrial manufacturing trials.

hero.title: Waste & Remediation
hero.body: Transforming industrial waste into valuable resources through phytoremediation and circular processing. We engineer natural systems for soil rehabilitation and land restoration to meet national environmental standards.

paragraphs: Waste & Remediation solutions address critical environmental challenges by transforming industrial and agricultural waste streams into high-value resources. Our approach leverages biological systems for soil detoxification and land rehabilitation, directly supporting Saudi Vision 2030 goals for environmental protection, circular economy development, and the restoration of the Kingdom’s natural ecosystems.
Environmental Assessment Conducting comprehensive site audits and soil/water analysis to identify contaminant profiles and establish baseline carbon sequestration metrics.
Phytoremediation Deployment Implementing targeted cultivation of specific hemp varieties engineered to extract heavy metals and pollutants while stabilizing the soil structure.
Circular Biomass Recovery Harvesting the remediation crop and utilizing specialized processing to safely sequester captured toxins or convert clean biomass into industrial feedstock.
Impact Validation & MRV Providing final technical reports, soil health certification, and verified carbon-negative data for national regulatory compliance and ESG reporting.

highlights.subtitle: Transforming environmental liabilities into industrial assets through precision phytoremediation and waste recycling.

items.title: Soil Phytoremediation
items.description: Utilizing specialized hemp cultivars to extract heavy metals and toxins from degraded industrial soil.

items.title: Carbon Sequestration
items.description: Verified protocols for capturing atmospheric carbon and storing it permanently within the soil and processed biomass.

items.title: Circular Waste Systems
items.description: Converting agricultural by-products into high-performance industrial feedstock, eliminating landfill dependency.

items.title: Land Rehabilitation
items.description: Advanced biological treatments designed to restore fertility and structural integrity to arid or over-farmed land.

items.title: Effluent Bio Filtration
items.description: Engineering natural fiber systems to filter and remediate industrial wastewater before discharge.

features.subTitle: Deploying site-specific remediation protocols and verified MRV data to transform degraded land and industrial waste into productive resources.

items.title: Advanced Technology
items.description: Deploying hemp systems to remediate soils and process industrial residues into controlled biomass via precision monitoring and lab validation.

items.title: Sustainable Solutions
items.description: Converting organic waste and remediation biomass into safe, usable outputs like bioenergy feedstock and stabilized industrial inputs.

items.title: Expert Support
items.description: Delivering site audits, waste characterization, remediation protocols, and verified Monitoring, Reporting, and Verification (MRV).

hero.title: Agriculture
hero.body: Deploying climate-adapted crops and regenerative agronomy to secure the Kingdom’s industrial feedstock. We engineer high-yield, water-efficient systems that restore soil health and drive national resource autonomy.

paragraphs: Sustainable agriculture is a cornerstone of environmental resilience and economic diversification under Saudi Vision 2030. Our agricultural solutions focus on improving productivity while reducing pressure on water resources and soil systems. By integrating regenerative practices and climate-adapted crops, we support long-term agricultural viability in arid and semi-arid regions.

Our approach combines science-based agronomy with regional priorities: Assessment of soil quality and land capability, Crop selection suited for arid climates, Efficient water and nutrient management, Continuous performance monitoring and optimization. This ensures agricultural productivity while protecting natural resources.

highlights.subtitle: Advancing the Kingdom’s food and material security through high-yield, water-efficient regenerative agronomy.

items.title: Arid-Climate Genetics
items.description: Seed varieties optimized for the Kingdom’s temperature extremes and high salinity levels.

items.title: Water-Efficiency Protocols
items.description: Advanced irrigation strategies designed to minimize agricultural water use.

items.title: Soil Health Restoration
items.description: Regenerative practices that rebuild organic matter and structural integrity in degraded lands.

items.title: Rapid Biomass Growth
items.description: High-yield cycles delivering consistent industrial raw materials in under 150 days.

features.subTitle: Providing end-to-end agronomic management, from soil capability assessment to optimized harvesting, ensuring a reliable national feedstock supply.

items.title: Advanced Technology
items.description: Using precision a gritech and salt-tolerant crop genetics to maximize biomass yields while significantly reducing freshwater demand.

items.title: Sustainable Solutions
items.description: Applying soil restoration practices and efficient nutrient management to convert arid land into productive, carbon- sequestering agricultural systems.

items.title: Expert Support
items.description: Managing the full cultivation lifecycle—from land capability assessment to optimized harvesting—ensuring a reliable, locally secured feedstock supply.

hero.title: Animal care
hero.body: Providing high-performance bio-materials for livestock comfort and health management. We engineer traceable, absorbent, and antimicrobial solutions that enhance animal welfare and hygiene while optimizing operational biosecurity across the livestock sector.

paragraphs: Hemp-based animal care solutions provide clean, high-performance alternatives for livestock comfort, nutrition, and health management. We use bio-based inputs to enhance animal welfare and hygiene while reducing environmental impact.

Aligned with Saudi Vision 2030, our animal care portfolio supports sustainable food systems, responsible resource use, and improved agricultural efficiency. By deploying superior, locally sourced bio-materials, we ensure a sovereign supply of traceable, compostable solutions that drive the Kingdom’s circular bio-economy.
Material Analysis: Auditing livestock environments to determine the optimal fiber-to-core ratio for absorbency and ammonia control.

Local Sourcing: Processing locally grown biomass into dust-screened, antimicrobial bedding and nutritional feedstock. Deployment Support: Providing guidance on integration into existing farm management systems to improve biosecurity and animal health.
Waste Valorization: Facilitating the transition of used materials into nutrient-rich compost, returning value to the agricultural land.

highlights.subtitle: Enhancing livestock biosecurity and welfare with antimicrobial, absorbent bio-materials for cleaner agricultural systems.

items.title: Superior Absorbency
items.description: Absorbs up to 4x its weight, maintaining a drier and cleaner environment.

items.title: Antimicrobial Performance
items.description: Natural resistance to bacteria, mold, and pests without chemical treatment.

items.title: Respiratory Protection
items.description: Dust-screened materials designed to minimize respiratory stress for animals and handlers.

items.title: Ammonia Control
items.description: High cation-exchange capacity that neutralizes odors and improves air quality in enclosures.

items.title: Thermal Insulation
items.description: Provides consistent temperature regulation for comfort in both extreme heat and cold.

features.subTitle: Collaborating with livestock managers to implement high-performance bio-material systems that improve operational hygiene and environmental compliance.

items.title: Advanced Technology
items.description: Using the natural antimicrobial and high absorbency properties of hemp to create pathogen-resistant environments for commercial livestock.

items.title: Sustainable Solutions
items.description: Transforming industrial biomass into fully compostable bedding and nutrition inputs that reduce waste and return vital nutrients to the soil.

items.title: Expert Support
items.description: Providing Seed-to-Stable traceability and moisture- performance data to help producers meet high standards of animal welfare.

hero.title: Animal care
hero.body: Developing & Supplying high-purity hemp extracts and seed oils for advanced skincare, haircare, and spa applications with transparent sourcing. We provide COAs, stability data, and formulation guidance to shorten R&D cycles and ensure regulatory compliance.

paragraphs: Hemp-derived ingredients are redefining the cosmetics and personal care industry through clean, high-potency formulations. We unlock the plant’s biological potential to deliver essential fatty acids, antioxidants, and skin barrier support—all without common allergens.

At Green Desert, we believe premium personal care should reflect a sustainable relationship with the environment. By localizing the production of high-purity botanical extracts, we provide the industry with traceable, bio-based raw materials that align with Saudi Vision 2030’s goals for industrial innovation.

Our extraction and lab approach ensures high-purity, standardized bio-actives: Precision, solvent-free extraction and chemical profiling, Stability and compatibility testing for shelf-life and formulation synergy and Technical documentation and COAs to meet SFDA and international standards. This method delivers consistent, high-quality actives while supporting regulatory compliance.

highlights.subtitle: Unlocking the biological potential of high-purity hemp actives to redefine clean beauty and personal care formulations.

items.title: Fatty Acid Profile
items.description: Rich in Omega-3, 6, and 9 to deeply nourish the skin barrier and prevent transepidermal water loss.

items.title: Antioxidant Protection
items.description: High concentrations of Vitamin E and phenolic compounds to combat oxidative stress from environmental pollutants.

items.title: Non-Comedogenic
items.description: A specialized lightweight oil profile that provides intense hydration without clogging pores.

items.title: Anti-Inflammatory Properties
items.description: Natural soothing compounds that reduce skin redness and sensitivity in dermatological applications.

features.subTitle: Providing manufacturers with standardized bio-actives, rigorous stability validation, and formulation expertise to accelerate R&D and ensure regulatory excellence.

items.title: Advanced Technology
items.description: Using gentle, solvent-free extraction methods to preserve the integrity of Omega-3 and Omega-6 fatty acids and potent antioxidants for superior skin-barrier support.

items.title: Sustainable Solutions
items.description: Replacing synthetic ingredients with locally sourced, bio-based , high-potency ingredients for skincare, haircare, and to reduce the environmental footprint of personal care products.

items.title: Expert Support
items.description: Providing COAs and formulation guidance to streamline development and ensure full regulatory compliance.

hero.title: Food & beverage
hero.body: Developing high-density plant-based proteins and nutrient-rich hemp derivatives for the functional food market. We provide stabilized, traceable ingredients and technical support to enhance nutritional profiles and drive food security.

paragraphs: Hemp-derived ingredients are redefining the cosmetics and personal care industry through clean, high-potency formulations. We unlock the plant’s biological potential to deliver essential fatty acids, antioxidants, and skin barrier support—all without common allergens.

At Green Desert, we believe premium personal care should reflect a sustainable relationship with the environment. hero.title: Pharmaceutical & Wellness
hero.body: creating high-purity cannabinoids for medical and therapeutic applications. We provide clinical-quality inputs, comprehensive lab validation, and stability data to support pharmaceutical R&D and national health initiatives.

paragraphs: The pharmaceutical and wellness sectors are evolving toward bio-based, evidence-backed solutions. We specialize in the extraction of high-purity hemp compounds that serve as active pharmaceutical ingredients (APIs) and therapeutic supplements. By prioritizing molecular integrity and standardized potency, we provide the pharmaceutical industry with the reliable raw materials needed for advanced drug development.

Our approach ensures that every compound is traceable from seed to shelf, aligning with Saudi Vision 2030’s goals for localizing pharmaceutical manufacturing and improving the quality of preventative care.
Molecular Profiling Selecting hemp genetics with specific chemical expressions to target desired therapeutic outcomes and active compound yields.
Precision Isolation Employing multi-stage purification processes to extract and refine targeted cannabinoids while maintaining molecular stability.
Laboratory Certification Executing exhaustive third-party and internal testing to provide a complete chemical and safety profile for every production lot.
Clinical Integration Partnering with researchers and manufacturers to develop standardized delivery systems and support localized pharmaceutical R&D.

highlights.subtitle: Bridging molecular science and patient care with clinical-grade isolates and bioactive compounds for medical innovation.

items.title: High-Purity Isolates
items.description: Specialized production of CBD, CBG, and other cannabinoids at 99%+ purity levels for medical applications.

items.title: Stability Validated
items.description: Ingredients tested under various environmental conditions to ensure potency remains consistent throughout the product lifecycle.

items.title: Formulation Flexibility
items.description: Ingredients available in oil, isolate, and water-soluble formats for integration into capsules, topicals, or liquid tinctures.

items.title: National API Supply
items.description: Localized production of active ingredients, reducing dependence on global pharmaceutical imports and securing the national supply chain.

features.subTitle: Scaling medical-grade innovation by integrating high-purity molecular extraction with the rigorous stability testing and clinical documentation required for pharmaceutical advancement.

items.title: Advanced Technology
items.description: Using CO2 and chromatography technologies to isolate specific cannabinoids and terpenes with pharmaceutical-level purity and zero residual solvents.

items.title: Sustainable Solutions
items.description: Providing consistent, batch-verified active ingredients that allow for precise dosing and predictable therapeutic outcomes in medical and wellness formulations.

items.title: Expert Support
items.description: Delivering full technical dossiers, Certificates of Analysis (COAs), and stability profiles to ensure seamless SFDA registration and adherence to global Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP).
